story.text: Berlin is a non-stop party. Met up with my cousin and we partied all night friday until the birds sang. Then played ultimate frisbee in the park, then partied all night saturday at a house until the birds sang again (we all sang songs about milk shakes on the walk home). Sunday was a trip to the Stasi museum, a park, and then some much needed rest. I am old. But, I very much loved dancing all the nights away in Berlin. An experience I will not soon forget. The city will have a proper dance club, that is for sure.

Boarded a plane this morning to come to Scotland. After a frustrating search for the rental car company on a beautiful afternoon, I was upgraded from a smart car to an E class Mercedes. Lucky day. Beautiful drive to Loch Fyne and then did a bit of work overlooking the Loch. Early bed for a big day tomorrow at Dunderave Castle, Invereray Castle, and some more remnants of a castle up on Loch Awe. Perhaps a bit of time to get down to Ostel Bay. SOOOOOOOOOO EXCITED FOR TOMORROW!!!!
